properties.Name: LegalEntityAccountingPolicy
properties.Description: The accounting policies in place during the specified period.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description:
The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

In this case it is the business, organization or legal entity whose books are being recorded and financial statements presented.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date that the accounting policies were in effect.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The ending date that the accounting policies were in effect.

Columns.Name: InventoryValuationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Inventory Valuation Method.

Columns.Name: DepreciationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Depreciation Method.

Columns.Name: TaxBasisId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Tax Basis.
